description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Conversant adapter.
title: Conversant Adapter Params

___bidfloor.description: Minimum bid price that will be considered.

___site_id.description: A Conversant specific ID which identifies the site.

___secure.description: Override http/https context on ad markup.

___api.description: Array of supported API frameworks.  For videos only.

___maxduration.description: Maximum duration in seconds.  For videos only.

___mimes.description: Array of content MIME types.  For videos only.

___protocols.description: Array of supported video protocols.  For videos only.

___mobile.description: Indicate if the site is mobile optimized.
